features: 🌴【Support Models】These Steam mop pads compatible with Shark Steam Pocket Mops and Euro Pro Models S3500 series, S3501, S3550, S3601, S3601D, S3801, S3801CO, S3901, SE450, S2901, S2902, S3450, S3452, S3455K, S3501SPN, S3501WM, S3601C, S3601K, S3601Q, S3601W, S3601WC, S3901A, S3901C, S3901D, S3901FS, S3901K, S3901Q, S3901W, S3901WC, S3901WM, SE400 Steam Mop Pads. DOES NOT FIT the XL size pads and XL mop head. DOES NOT FIT the pads with one wider and one narrower rectangular mop head.

🌴【Superior Cleaning Performance】steam mop replacement pads with super strong water absorption while helping your steam mop cleaner solution release quickly, and dry fast, without fading in high temperatures. The microfiber material effectively captures dirt, dust, and pet hair, with strong absorption and quick-drying features, leaving your floors spotless.

🌴【Suitable for Most Surfaces】Steam Mop Replacement Pads keep your mop working well to clean the dirty, water stain, paper scrap, dust and lock pets' hair on all sealed hard floors, such as hardwood floors, ceramic tile, laminate floors, marble floors, stone floors. Won't scratch the floor surfaces. This microfiber mop pad is a versatile cleaning tool that can be used throughout your kitchen and home.

🌴【Easy to Install & Replace】 These steam mop Pads are washable and reusable, suitable for wet and dry use. This steam mop hard floor cleaner replacement pad has a strong hook and loop design at the opening making it simply attach and remove when dirty. The microfiber mop pads are designed to fit perfectly on your steam mop and are easy to attach and remove, making cleaning a breeze.

🌴【Value 5 Pack Mop Pad Set】Save Money with 5-pack steam mop replacement pads s3601 is made of double-sided thick microfiber with hook and loop strip closure is easy to install, and keeps the mop and steam mop replacement pads stuck tightly. When your steam mop pad for hardwood floor cleaning is dirty after use, just toss it in the washing machine with no fabric softener and let them air dry until you need them again.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CLEAN ACROSS ALL HARD FLOORS These steam mop pads are compatible with Shark professional mop and fit for use on all sealed hard floors. The soft microfiber surface glides easily on our lovely floor and saves it from scratches. MORE ALWAYS KEEP YOUR HOME CLEAN These pads for Shark steam mop are good for advanced cleaning performance and durability. MORE PERFECT FIT FOT YOUR SHARK POCKET MOP This steam pocket mop pad is a standard sized(Approx. 12.6 x 7 inches/32 x 18cm) rectangle mop pad used with a standard rectangle mop head, NOT for XL(16 x 6 x 1 inch) Rectangle Pocket Mop Heads. MORE

QUALITY steam mop pad set for you SAVE MONEY AND THE EARTH Just toss these pocket mop replacement pads in the washing machine with no fabric softener and let them air dry until you need them again. EASY TO INSTALL Easy to install so you can get back to cleaning as soon as possible. Simply attach and take off when dirty. KEEP YOUR HEALTHY Super strong water absorption while helping your replacement steam mop pads compatible with Shark cleaner release easily. PET-FRIENDLY Steam clean use only water. No harsh chemicals need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great on the steamer we have. Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good product, company is fantastic
reviews.reviewText: i love the pads but wish that the Velcro was more durable through the washing process. i clean homes and use alot of these. this is my first choice, but the Velcro (like all the others) does not withstand the washing and soon wears out. sometimes the first wash. but that is true of all of them it seems. these do the best job with getting grime and everything off of the floor with less effort. the smooth ones that might be a little cheaper take much more effort to get the floors completely clean. so I choose this fabric and texture over the others. they are also easier to get on and off of the steamer. the cheaper smooth ones fit so tight they are hard to get on and off. do not put in the dryer no matter what you decide to buy. they will shrink and then you won't be able to fit on the steamer. always let them air dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They fit our Shark steam mop but may be just a little too thick. Seems a bit hard to get them wet with the mop itself so you'll need to pre moisten them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for your money.
reviews.reviewText: When you clean for a living this is a great product that saves you money. Easy to use and clean in the washing machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits the Shark correct!
reviews.reviewText: I see no difference in these compared to what came with the shark. Fits perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this because I wanted new pads for my shark steam mop. They work just like my other mop heads. They fit the same and they stay on. They are a little on the thinner side but that’s ok. It’s a 5 pack so I liked that too. They seem to do good even after several washes. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not thick at all
reviews.reviewText: This product is too thin the other pads that I had were really thick so I use the number off the machine I had and that's what it referred me to to the ones I got so I would not buy these again I'll shop around for the thicker ones that I had that came with the machine
